name: Interactive Score Card
short_description: Flexible and configurable DHIS 2 Score card application with limited interactive capabilities
description: Flexible and configurable DHIS 2 Score card application with limited interactive capabilities, among features score card includes:
features: One click navigation across organization units, up and down the hierarchy
One click navigation across periods, traversing one period at a time into the past/future
Flexible and customizable, from indicators, data sources, layouts to the whole score-card template.
Highest resolutions score card on any media (powered by svg vector graphics & powerful css 3 )

name: Interactive Score Card Widget
short_description: Flexible and configurable DHIS 2 Score card application widget with limited interactive capabilities
description: Flexible and configurable DHIS 2 Score card application with limited interactive capabilities, among features score card includes:
features: One click navigation across organization units, up and down the hierarchy
One click navigation across periods, traversing one period at a time into the past/future
Flexible and customizable, from indicators, data sources, layouts to the whole score-card template.
Highest resolutions score card on any media (powered by svg vector graphics & powerful css 3 )

name: Metabase
short_description: DHIS 2 Platform based HTML App for management of Metadata Repository hosting metadata
description: DHIS 2 Platform based HTML App for management of Metadata Repository hosting metadata from multiple dhis2 implementations for reuse within few clicks.The Application is powered by AngularJS, HTML5 and CSS3
features: Support for user friendly outline of package with essential details
User friendly import results preview
Support for Import and Preview Import
Support for classification of metadata
Support for data table preview of metadata in packages
Support Unique Shareable URL for Every Display Page
Support for indicating app in repository already installed
Support for multiple concurrent import operations

name: Interactive Dashboard
short_description: Flexible and Fully fledged DHIS 2 Dashboard application with interactive and intuitive capabilities
description: Flexible and Fully fledged DHIS 2 Dashboard application with interactive and intuitive capabilities, among features of idashboard includes:
features: Ability to instantly with one-click, switch between table, chart and map visualization
Ability to change and multi-select periods of visualizations right away without leaving
Ability to change and multi-select organization units of visualizations without leaving your chart/table/map
Ability to instantly change layout table/chart, i.e. rows to colums or series to categories, and vice versa
Highest resolutions charts possible( powered by highcharts)
Mobile ready, with adoptive user interface for all screen sizes
Extremely Lightweight and can operate on low bandwidth

name: HISPTZ Touch
short_description: HTML5, Javascripts & CSS powered light-weight offline solution for android, apple and windows phone
description: HTML5, Javascripts & CSS powered light-weight offline solution for android, apple and windows phone, that aims to ship full dhis2 web experience completely offline on your smartphone. Among it's already completed features includes:
features: Support for off-line aggregate data entry
Support for off-line standard reports
Extremely lightweight and compatible with widest range of smartphone devices

name: Hisptz Touch Dashboard
features: Ability to instantly with one-click, switch between table, chart and map visualization
Highest resolutions charts possible( powered by highcharts)
Extremely Lightweight and can operate on low bandwidth

name: Pocket DHIS 2 OS
short_description: DHIS 2 Operating system, for personalized live and real-time experience of dhis2
description: DHIS 2 Operating system, for personalized live and real-time experience of dhis2
features: Pre-installed dhis2 setup on your flash-disk ready to go for training/mass-distribution
Effortless installation of dhis2 powered linux on your computer without need of any technical expertise
Get a self-guided and personalized dhis2 demo and tour from your pen drive, right over tea-break
Train yourself with pre-loaded modules of dhis2 trainings right on your pocket
